subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Chances are strong that the Belmont Stakes will feature a rematch between Animal Kingdom, the Kentucky Derby champion, and Shackleford, the Preakness winner.
snippet: Chances are strong that the Belmont Stakes will feature a rematch between Animal Kingdom, the Kentucky Derby champion, and Shackleford, the Preakness winner.
